name: Eat Your Heart Out - Octopus Necklace
description:
An ode to a sailor's grave...

A handmade resin creation featuring an anatomical heart cameo in a purple octopus setting, with a hanging anchor charm.

This necklace hangs from a 30" black ball chain. This chain can be cut with wire cutters or scissors if you prefer a shorter chain length.

If you would like us to cut the chain for you before we ship it out, please message us your preferred chain length, for instance 16.5", 18", 24", etc. and we will gladly cut it for you. Otherwise this necklace will ship out with a 30" chain.

name: So Sweet - Sparkle Cherry Necklace
description:
So Sweet...

A unique handmade resin necklace featuring a juicy pink cherry cabochon. The cameo is lavender resin with lots of imbedded shiny glitter, set in a hot pink Victorian style ornate frame. The cherry leaves have been painted lime green with a special enamel paint which has a high tolerance to chipping.

This piece is exclusive to Charcoal Designs and won't be found anywhere else.

If you would like us to cut the chain for you before we ship it out, please message us your preferred chain length, for instance 16.5", 18", 24", etc. and we will gladly cut it for you. Otherwise this necklace will ship out with a 30" chain.

name: Living Doll - Glitter Silhouette Necklace
description:
A unique handmade resin necklace featuring a doll and high heel silhouette cabochons set on a black glittered out faceted cameo, which has been set in a black French style frame.

This piece is exclusive to Charcoal Designs and won't be found anywhere else.

This necklace hangs from a 30" black ball chain. This chain can be cut with wire cutters or scissors if you prefer a shorter chain length. 

If you would like us to cut the chain for you before we ship it out, please message us your preferred chain length, for instance 16.5", 18", 24", etc. and we will gladly cut it for you. Otherwise this necklace will ship out with a 30" chain.

name: Lost At Sea - Skull & Bones Necklace
description:
Dead men tell no tales...

Our 'Lost At Sea' necklace features a hand cast resin skull & bones pendant hung from a 30" black ball chain. This listing is for 1 necklace. Your color choice of black on red, black on purple, or black on hot pink.

Each necklace is made to order, please allow a few days for your order to ship.

Materials: Black metal ball chain. Handmade resin pendants.

Size: The skull and bones pendant measures approximately: 2.5" X 1.5". 

The necklace chain measures 30" long. The chain can easily be cut with wire cutters or scissors if you prefer a shorter length. 

If you would like us to cut the chain for you before we ship it out, please message us your preferred chain length, for instance 16.5", 18", 24", etc. and we will gladly cut it for you. Otherwise this necklace will ship out with a 30" chain.

name: Burial At Sea - Hot Pink OR Red
description:
'Burial At Sea' is a tribute to the sailor who is lost at sea, his solitary grave lies deep in the darkest craters of the ocean. 

*Your necklace choice of Hot Pink/Black or Red/Black. 

Our newest assemblage necklace 'Burial At Sea' features a large skull and bones pendant, anatomical heart cameos, black bones, and matching skulls. Available in hot pink and black, or red and black.

Each necklace is made to order, please allow a few days for your order to ship. 

Materials: Black enameled aluminum chain. Handmade resin pendants.

Size: The largest pendant (the center skull and bones)  measures approximately: 2.5" X 1.5".  The necklace itself measures approximately 17.5" long.

*Modeled by Natasha Neurotica. Natasha is wearing our Hot Pink/Black 'Burial At Sea' necklace.

name: Ouija Board Spider Necklace
description:
A handmade resin creation featuring a resin Ouija board inspired pendant with a black spider embellishment.

The pendant is hung from a 30" black ball chain. It can easily be cut with wire cutters or strong scissors if you prefer a shorter length.

If you would like us to cut the chain for you before we ship it out, please message us your preferred chain length, for instance 16.5", 18", 24", etc. and we will gladly cut it for you. Otherwise this necklace will ship out with a 30" chain.

name: Very Cherry Necklace - Pink & Baby Blue
description:
Very Cherry - Pink, Baby Blue & Black Retro Reproduction Necklace!

Our juicy retro cherry necklace, was inspired by the gorgeous vintage Bakelite necklaces of the 40s and 50s. This affordable version is exclusive to our shop and hand made to order!

The cherry stems on the smaller pendants are hand painted with a 'budge proof' enamel paint.

Our 'Very Cherry' necklace features hand cast resin reproduction cherry pendants. This eye-catching statement piece is ripe and ready to wear!

Materials: Black enameled aluminum chain. Handmade resin pendants.

Measurements: 17.5" chain length, the largest pendant (black cherry) is approximately: 1.5" X 1.25".

name: Very Cherry Necklace - Red & Black
description:
Very Cherry - Red & Black Retro Reproduction Necklace!

Our juicy retro cherry necklace, was inspired by the gorgeous vintage Bakelite necklaces of the 40s and 50s. This affordable version is exclusive to our shop and hand made to order!

The cherry stems on the smaller pendants are hand painted with a 'budge proof' enamel paint.

Our 'Very Cherry' necklace features hand cast resin reproduction cherry pendants. This eye-catching statement piece is ripe and ready to wear!

Materials: Black enameled aluminum chain. Handmade resin pendants.

Measurements: 17.5" chain length, the largest pendant (red and black cherries) are approximately: 1.5" X 1.25".

name: Very Cherry Earrings - Pink & Baby Blue
description:
Handmade cherry earrings, made in our Los Angeles area studio from hand cast resin, the leaves are hand painted black (with a special chip resistant paint). Featuring fish hook style earrings with a faceted glass bead embellishment.

These earrings match our pink/blue Very Cherry necklace (sold separately).

Each earring measures approximately: 2.5" X 1"

name: Very Cherry Earrings - Red & Black
description:
Handmade cherry earrings, made in our Los Angeles area studio from hand cast resin, the leaves are hand painted a bright lime green (with a special chip resistant paint). Featuring fish hook style earrings with a faceted glass bead embellishment. 

These earrings match our Tutti Frutti & Very Cherry necklaces (each sold separately). 

Each earring measures approximately: 2.5" X 1"

name: Love Is Sweet - Candy Heart Earrings
description:
Our 'Love Is Sweet' earrings are made with hand cast resin 'I Love U' heart charms and colored glass bead embellishments, hung from silver colored metal fish hook earrings. The back of the hearts are flat and smooth. This listing is for 1 pair of earrings (2 earrings total). Your choice of Pink, Blue or Purple.

These earrings have been made to match our 'Love Is Sweet' bracelet (sold separately).

Each earring measures approximately: 2.75" tall X 1 1/16" wide.

Why wait until Valentine's day? These make a great gift for an anniversary, wedding, birthday or any situation that calls for an 'I Love U' present!

name: Frankenstein Earrings - Ghouly Green
description:
A pair of ghouly green Frank'N'Stein earrings made with hand cast resin charms and black glass faceted bead embellishments, hung from silver colored metal fish hook earrings. The Frankenstein head charms are 3 dimensional and feature full detail throughout.

Each earring measures approximately: 2.5" tall X 5/8" wide.

name: Taxidermy 'Ornate Framed' Necklace - Your Choice Of Animal
description: A Charcoal Designs exclusive. Ornate framed taxidermy necklaces, your choice of a tiger, a rhinoceros or a gorilla. Please note: Each piece is hand cast (handmade). We try our best to cast these exactly as shown, but due to the nature of some molds, bubbles do occur. For instance as shown in the rhino close up photo, some tiny parts (like on the ear) may get cut off in the production process. With certain molds this is hard to avoid. Also colors may differ slightly from batch to batch, but we try our best to keep them accurate as possible. If you prefer to see a photo of the exact item you are ordering before it is sent out please message us. Each piece is made of hand cast resin and hangs from a 30" black aluminum ball chain. The chain can be trimmed with scissors or snips if you prefer a shorter length. Each measures approximately: 2.5" X 2" (the frame itself). The rhino head stands out about 1 7/8", the tiger stands out 1 3/8", and the gorilla stands out about 1".

name: Beachy Ornate Mini Frame Set - Sea Shells
description:
A beachy chic set of two mini ornate wall plaques, featuring two-tone sea shells on a glitter background. There is a hole on the back (top) of each to make these easy to hang on a wall or simply display them on a shelf.

The resin frame, shells and background are hand cast and hand dyed in our studio. The glitter is coated with heavy layer of clear varnish, so it will never flake. 

The frames measure approximately: 3.5" X 2.5" ea.

name: Twins - Lavender Mermaids Plaque - SOLD
description:
A lovely vision of twin lavender mermaids rest on a pink wooden wall plaque. Adorned with purple glitter vinyl, a resin ornate gold colored frame, with hand cast resin mermaids. 

The mermaids them self are hand painted, with high gloss enamel paints, complete make up with lipstick, mod white eyeshadow and 60s style winged eyeliner. A shiny coat of gloss has been placed over each mermaid to protect them from the elements. These little lovelies are slightly raised (glued on securely to wooden risers) to give them depth. There is a hook on back for convenient hanging. 

Material: Resin mermaids, and ornate frame, wood plaque, acrylic and enamel paints 

Measurements: The complete plaque measures 6 7/8" X 5".

name: Anchors Away - Retro Repro Necklace
description:
Our salute to classic vintage assemblage necklaces. Our 'Anchor's Away' necklace features big hand cast resin anchors and detailed vintage eagle & anchor charms. A sailor gal's delight!

Materials: Resin charms and pendants, enameled aluminum chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure. 

Measurements: The necklace is 17.5" long, the largest pendant (the anchors) measure approximately 2.5" X 2", the smallest charm measures .75".

name: The Odyssey - Octopus Cameo Necklace
description:
The Odyssey is our latest nautical inspired necklace. A large black ornate frame cradles a red and black octopus cameo, creating a gallant statement piece. 

*As seen on Spike T.V.'s Tattoo Rescue (1st episode) 

Material: Black epoxy ball chain, Resin pendant, aluminum jump ring.

Size: The cameo (including the frame) measures 2.5" X 2". The ball chain measures 30" (if desired, it can be trimmed to a shorter length with scissors or tin snips).

*Modeled by the lovely Chardae

name: The Devil Is In The Details - Lucifer Hair Clips
description:
Little retro red devil hair clips, hand cast in shiny resin, adhered to sturdy metal hair pins. You will receive two hair clips.

Material: Resin cabochons, metal hair clips. 

Size: The devil head measures 6/8" (less than 1" tall), the entire hair clip (including devil head) is 2 1/8" long.

name: Glitter Vinyl - Hair Barrettes
description:
Our ultra shiny handmade barrettes feature colorful glitter vinyl fabric in your choice of a swallow, bat, heart or mustache. The best part is that each barrette is reversible, each side is a different color, it's two looks in one for the same price! These are great for keeping hair up without denting your locks, as compared to using hair rubber bands. Each barrette comes with a wooden hair stick embellished with a hand cast resin frank'n'stein decorative end. 

*These types of barrettes work best on long hair or thick hair. 

Material: Glitter vinyl, wood, resin 

Size: The heart measures: 4.25" X 2.75", The swallow measures: 4.5" X 3.5", The bat measures: 4 1/8 X 2.25", The mustache measures 4.25" X 1.75". The hair stick measures approximately 5.5" long.

name: Showdown - Western Gun & Holster Necklace
description:
Our 'Showdown' western necklace, features a hand sewn holster, a metal western themed stud, and a hand cast resin revolver gun that is removable from it's holster! Talk about a conversation piece. Your choice of a red glitter vinyl holster with a bullet stud, a faux blue leather holster with a revolver stud, or a purple glitter vinyl with a horseshoe stud. All necklace chains are 30" long.

Material: Glitter vinyl and faux leather, metal stud, resin gun, epoxy coated ball chain, aluminum jump ring.

Size: 30" ball chain (can be trimmed shorter with scissors if desired), the holster measures 3" X 2 5/8", the removable gun measures 2.5" X 1".

name: Love Is Sweet - Candy Hearts Bracelet
description:
Our so sweet candy hearts bracelet features pastel colored candy charms cast from real candy hearts, these little beauties are really resin, but you'd swear they were the real thing, just don't try and eat em'. 

Material: Resin pendants, lavender colored aluminum chain, candy colored glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp closure. 

Measurements: The bracelet measures 7.5" long, the largest heart measures approximately 1" X 1" big.

name: Big Kahuna - Tiki Necklace
description:
Our good luck tiki, the big kahuna, is made of solid hand cast resin, and features genuine Swarovski crystal eyes. This sturdy pendant hangs from a 30" stainless steel chain. Don't just save him for a luau, he's soon to be your new favorite go-to piece! 

Material: black hand cast solid resin, metal screw, stainless steel ball chain. 

Size: 30" ball chain (can be trimmed shorter with scissors or tin snips), the tiki pendant is 1 5/8" tall X 1" wide.

name: Homeward Bound - Swallow Necklace
description:
Our stunning new resin necklaces feature a chunky black swallow silhouette pendant, which hangs from your choice of a black, bright green, lavender or a dark pink thick aluminum jump ring. Our chain features lightweight aluminum links with shimmery silver edges. 

This necklaces comes in one length but it can be adjusted to a shorter length if the mood strikes you by simply hooking the clasp onto a shorter chain link. 

Material: Hand cast solid resin pendant, aluminum chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: The chain length is 17", the swallow bird pendant measures 2" X 2 1/8".

name: Arrowhead - Camp Necklace
description:
Our marbled camping inspired necklace offers the look and feel of a real arrowhead stone with the comfort and versatility of hand cast resin. The arrowhead is a faux-turquoise marbled resin pendant hung from a dark pink jump ring, the feather is a pink marbled resin pendant hung from a bright green jump ring. 

Since each pendant is hand cast and unique, the marbling effect will differ from piece to piece.

Material: Resin pendants, aluminum jump rings, stainless steel ball chain.

*This listing is for our Arrowhead necklace, if you are interested in the earrings or rings in the last photo, please message us. info[at]charcoaldesigns[dot]com. Thanks!

Measurements: The arrowhead cabochon (pendant) measures 2" X 1.5", the feather measures 1.25" X .5" , The necklace chain is 30" long (if you prefer a shorter length, it can be cut to size with scissors).

name: Tutti Frutti - Retro Repro Necklace
description:
Our retro fruit necklace, was inspired by enchanting Hollywood movie stars like 1940's icon Carmen Miranda. Fruit is fabulous and fun, show off your fierce side with a fresh fruit adornment!

Our Tutti Frutti necklace features hand cast resin reproduction fruit pendants. Juicy pineapples, bananas, and cherries embellish this eye-catching statement piece. Ripe and ready to wear! 

Materials: Black enameled aluminum chain. Handmade resin pendants. 

Measurements: 17.5" chain length, the largest pendant (pineapple) is approximately: 2.25" long X 1" wide. The smallest pendants are approximately: 7/8" X 7/8" round.

name: 'Pulling Teeth' - Ornate Gold Tooth Necklace
description:
'Pulling Teeth' features a detailed tooth cameo, made in our studio from hand cast resin. The tooth cameo is set in an ornate black resin frame. One solitary gold tooth sits amongst numerous pearly white molars. The black chain is made of large linked, medium weight, aluminum. A true statement piece.

Measurements: 2.5" X 2" Pendant, 17.5" Chain length, 15mm X 10mm Chain link length. 

Materials: Hand cast resin pendant, Enameled aluminum chain, Silver plated lobster clasp closure.

name: Black Skeleton Seahorse Coffin Keyhook - One Of A Kind! (#02)
description:
A cute one of a kind handmade retro seahorse key hook! A hand cut coffin shaped wood plaque, featuring a hand cast resin black 'Shelly Skelli' seahorse, which is hand painted with long lasting 'glossies' paint. The background is green glitter vinyl, with genuine Swarovski crystal embellishments and a hand cast resin seashell. Our plaques are made with love and will last many years to come!

There is a hole drilled in the back of the plaque, simply nail a small nail or screw into the wall and place the plaque over the nail. The hook on the bottom is convenient for hanging your keys, a coat or perhaps your favorite vintage kitchen apron! 

Size: The plaque measures approximately 5" X 3.25" at it's largest points. 

Sale: Was $17, Now Only $13.50!

name: Seafoam Seahorse Coffin Plaque Keyhook - One Of A Kind! (#01)
description:
A cute one of a kind handmade retro seahorse key hook! A hand cut coffin shaped wood plaque, featuring a hand cast resin seafoam 'Shelly Skelli' seahorse, which is hand painted with long lasting 'glossies' paint. The background is green glitter vinyl, with genuine Swarovski crystal embellishments and a hand cast resin seashell and starfish. Our plaques are made with love and will last many years to come!

There is a hole drilled in the back of the plaque, simply nail a small nail or screw into the wall and place the plaque over the nail. The hook on the bottom is convenient for hanging your keys, a coat or perhaps your favorite vintage kitchen apron! 

Size: The plaque measures approximately 5" X 3.25" at it's largest points. 

Sale: Was $17, Now Only $13.50!

name: It's Your Birthday! - Birthday Cake Ring In Pink
description:
You say it's your birthday? Well let's celebrate with a delicious birthday cake ring, in pretty pink! Even if it's not your birthday, every other day of the year is your happy unbirthday, so make it a good one!

'It's your birthday' features a hand cast resin cake cabochon with hand painted candles on an adjustable sturdy silver colored ring. 

Ring measures approximately: 1" cake charm.

name: Pantera Negro - Black Panther Necklace
description:
Pantera Negro - Black Panther Necklace

The panther is back in black! *NEW* Now with a stainless steel chain!

Featuring hand cast resin panther heads connected in the center with a red rose cabochon, hung from a stainless steel chain, with a silver plated lobster clasp closures. Your choice of either a 16.5" chain length or 18".

Material: hand cast resin pendants, metal stainless steel chain.

Size: 3.5" centerpiece length, your choice of chain length.

name: Virgin De Guadalupe - Ring Red OR Black
description:
Virgin De Guadalupe - Ring

Our hand cast resin Virgin De Guadalupe ring features a detailed Guadalupe cabochon set on a stainless steel sturdy adjustable ring base. It makes a stunning statement on any hand!

Your choice of Black OR Red.

Materials: Hand cast resin Guadalupe cabochon, stainless steel ring base.

Measurements: The Guadalupe cabochon is approximately 32" X 17".

name: Virgin De Guadalupe - Hairclips Set Of Red OR Black
description:
Virgin De Guadalupe

Detailed Virgin De Guadalupe cabochons on sturdy silver plated hair clips!

Material: Hand cast resin, silver plated hairclips.

Size: 2.5" total hair clip length X 1.5" X 5/8" Virgin De Guadalupe Cabochons.

You will receive one pair of hair clips (2 clips, as shown). Your color choice of red or black.

name: Silence Of The Lambs - Lamb Slaughter Necklace
description:
Silence Of The Lambs-Tribute Necklace

Featuring an innocent pink lamb (with a genuine swarovski crystal eye), running from a bloodied butcher knife, resting on a very realistic (it's really resin!) 'faux bois' wood slice. Each piece is hand cast resin, the butcher knife has been painted silver with resin blood splatters. Because each piece is handmade, the blood splatters will differ with each necklace. 

Materials: Hand cast resin pendant, glass swarovski crystal eye, stainless steel ball chain.

Measurements: 30" chain length (can be easily shortened with scissors to you desired chain length), the entire pendant measures approximately 2.5" X 2.25".

name: Aloha From Hell - The King Cameo Necklace
description:
Aloha From Hell

An Homage to Elvis 

Featuring a lime green on purple (monster colors!) cameo, set in an ornate black frame. The pendant hangs from a 30" black ball chain, which can easily be trimmed with scissors to your own desired chain length. 

*As seen on Spike T.V.'s Tattoo Rescue (1st episode) 

Materials: Hand cast resin pendant, black coated metal ball chain. 

Measures: 30" black metal ball chain, 2.75" X 1.75" Pendant.

name: It's Alive!! - Ornate Bat Cameo Necklace
description:
It's Alive!!

Reminiscent of the day Frankenstein's monster was born...

Featuring a red on black bat & lightning bolt cameo, with real swarovski crystal embellishments, set in a stunning ornate black frame. The pendant hangs from a large linked black enameled chain. 

Materials: Hand cast resin cameo and frame. Enameled aluminum chain. Silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Measures: 17" long necklace chain. 2.75" X 1.75" frame. Each chain link measures approximately 10mm X 6mm.

name: Tooth Fairy - Ornate Diamond Tooth Cameo Necklace
description:
Tooth Fairy 

Featuring a red tooth cameo, with a real swarovski crystal embellishment, set in a stunning ornate black frame. The pendant hangs from a large linked black enameled chain. 

Materials: Hand cast resin cameo and frame. Enameled aluminum chain. Silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Measures: 17" long necklace chain. 2.75" X 1.75" frame. Each chain link measures approximately 10mm X 6mm.

name: Hobo Harp - Mini Harmonica Necklace
description:
Hobo Harp Necklace

Working Harmonica Necklace

The best part about this little tin sandwich? It really plays! Hobo Harp features a miniature (and cute!) harmonica that really plays a tune...on an 30" ball chain, it can easily be shortened (with scissors or snips) for your desired length. Your choice of either a black ball chain, or a stainless steel ball chain.

Material: Mini metal harmonica, 30" ball chain (can easily be shortened with scissors, if you desire a shorter necklace length).

Size: 1.5" X .5" Harmonica, 30" ball chain.

name: The Cave - Bat Cameo Necklace
description:
The Cave

Our Cave necklace features a resin bat cameo set in a silver plated bezel hung from a black aluminum chain (chain is black with silver colored edges). Your choice of chain length.

Material: hand cast resin cameo, silver plated setting, aluminum black chain.

Size: Available in 16.5" chain length or 18"

name: Hey Bulldog - Bulldog Ring - Assorted Colors
description:
Hey Bulldog 

Featuring a hand cast resin bulldog cab affixed to a medium (sturdy) weight silver colored adjustable metal band! One size fits all! Available in purple, black or blue.

Material: Resin Bulldog, Silver Colored Adjustable Ring Band

Size: Each bulldog is approximately 18mm

name: Ms. Macabre - Skeleton Cameo Earrings
description:
Ms. Macabre

Skeleton Lady Frame Earrings

Featuring hand cast black resin frames with pink skeleton lady victorian cameos. Hung from fishook earrings with black glass bead embellishments, which match the beaded chain on our Ms. Macabre necklace!

Material: Plastic frame and skeleton cameos, faceted glass beads, metal fish hook style earrings.

Size: Approximately 2 3/4" long X 1" wide each.

name: Ms. Macabre - Adjustable Skeleton Cameo Ring
description:
Ms. Macabre

Skeleton Lady Framed Ring

Featuring a hand cast black resin frame with an eerie soft pink skeleton woman cameo in the center. The frame is affixed to a medium (sturdy) weight silver colored adjustable ring band! One size fits all! 

Material: Plastic frame and skeleton cameo, silver colored adjustable metal ring band

Size: Approximately 1.25" X 1".

name: Frank 'N' Stein Rings - Assorted Colors
description:
Frank 'N' Stein Ring

Monster Ring, Your Color Choice! Available in 'Puke Purple', 'Blood Red', or 'Gory Green'. 

Made to match our Frank 'N' Stein hairclips, our Frankie rings are made of hand cast resin secured to an adjustable sturdy metal ring base.

Material: Hand cast resin monster head, metal adjustable ring. 

Size: 20mm X 15mm monster head (less than 1 inch tall), adjustable ring size.

name: Stick 'Em Up - Gun Hair Clip Sets - Assorted Colors
description:
Stick 'Em Up

Detailed handgun hair clips on sturdy metal clips! You will receive 1 pair (2) of hair clips per order. Your color choice of white on black, black on red or red on black.

Material: Hand cast resin, silver plated hair clips.

Size: 2.5" total length X .75" wide

name: Frank 'N' Stein - Hair Clip Sets - Assorted Colors
description:
Frank 'N' Stein

Monster Hair Clips-Asst. Colors

Calling all movie monster fans, our Frank 'N' Stein hair clips feature lil' retro Frankenstein heads adhered to silver plated hair pins. Available in gory green, blood red, and puke purple.

Material: Handmade resin heads, silver plated pins with gluing pads. 

Size: 2.5" long, .75" Frankie head.

name: Head Shrinker - Voodoo Shrunken Head Key Chain
description:
Head Shrinker-Shrunken Head Key Chain

Part of our kreepy key chains collection featuring an old skool shrunken head, your choice of gory green, blood red, or puke purple.

Material: A large hand cast resin pendant (flat on back), metal locking key chain.

Size: 2.75" X 2" big, 16mm thick.

name: Mirror Mirror 'Marie Antoinette' Necklace Collection
description:
Mirror Mirror-Marie Antoinette 'Victorian' Inspired Necklaces

There are three necklace options available...

1. Pink Mirror-Marie Antoinette
2. Black Mirror-Marie Antoinette
3. Purple Mirror-Victorian Couple 

Material: hand cast resin pendant, genuine swarovski crystals, black aluminum chain, silver plated lobster clasp.

Size: 3" X 1.5" Pendant, 17.5" Chain

name: Sugar Shack - Candy Sprinkles & Heart Necklace
description:
Sugar Shack

A sugary sweet delight awaits, with our sugar shack necklace! Real candy sprinkles and gleaming glitter is encased in clear resin and finished with a pink hard candy topping, sweet!

Material: Hand cast resin, candy sprinkles, thick enameled black chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 16.5" chain length, large 2.25" heart pendant.

name: Beachcomber - Starship Hair Clip Set
description:
Beachcomber

Starfish Hair Clips

The perfect accessory for beachcombing, riding some waves or just gettin' a little sun! Reminiscent of the clips we wore as kids, the starfish clips are back! Available in an oceanic shade of aquamarine.

Material: Hand cast resin, silver plated hair clip.

Size: 2.75" length clips, 1.25" starfish.

name: Ship Wrecker - Purple Octopus Necklace
description:
Ship Wrecker

Octopus Necklace

Ship wrecked at sea, no one escapes the tenacious tentacles of the great illusive purple sea serpent.

Material: Hand cast resin octopus pendant, clear plastic cabochon, archival quality image in a metal bezel setting. Aluminum curb chain and metal black jumprings.

Size: 2.75" X 2.5" Pendant (measurement includes ship charm), Approximately 17" length.

name: BOOdrivers - A Set Monster Screwdrivers - 1 Phillips Head, 1 Flathead
description:
Monster BooDrivers

They're Terrorific!

Are you an edgy craftster, a cool mechanic, a horror loving handyman (or woman), then we've got the tool for you! Introducing Monster BooDrivers, no toolbox should be without a set!

Available in Red, Green, or Purple, custom colors available on request (additional charges may apply).

Our BooDrivers are sturdy, secure, strong and monster approved! 

Material: Resin monster heads secured onto sturdy metal phillips and flathead screwdrivers (1 each per set).

Size: Standard Sized Screwdrivers

name: BOOtle Openers - Monster Bottle Openers
description:
BOOtle Opener

Monster bottle opener, asst. colors!

If you're already a fan of our boodrivers, you're gonna love our bootle openers! The price is for 1 bootle opener, you choice of a mummy or wolfman in either red, green or purple. 

Features a sturdy 'church key' style metal bottle opener embedded deep into a thick resin monster head, a large eyehole on top holds a keychain and a long detachable ball chain (hang it on your neck, bbq grill or fence, or somewhere handy for your bottle opening needs)!

Material: Hand cast resin monster head, stainless metal ball chain, keychain and bottle opener.

Size: 30" chain length, 3.5" X 2" monster head (includes bottle opener).

name: Kitschy Christ - Resin Jesus Statue
description:
Kitschy Christ

You've never seen Jesus looking so kitschy. Available in gospel green (lime), passion purple (deep purple) or praised pink (hot pink). You'll be the queen of kitsch with one of these in your trailer.

Made of hand cast resin, dyed and poured in our studio. Molds can be a tricky thing and as you can see some of jesus's facial parts are missing (i.e. his Michael J nose job) but that just makes them more kitschy!!

Material: Hand poured resin.

Size: 6" tall, 1.75" wide.

name: Virgin De Guadalupe - Roses & Pendant Necklace
description:
Virgin De Guadalupe

Our Virgin De Guadalupe necklace is made with hand cast resin pendants with a silver colored chain, and a silver plated lobster clasp closure. Great for Dia De Los Muertos, Cinco De Mayo or any occasion.

Your choice of chain length. 16.5" or 18" Necklace.

Material: hand cast resin pendant, silver colored chain.

Size: 1.25" Virgin De Guadalupe Pendant

name: Cherry Bomb - Sparkle Cherry Cameo Necklace
description:
Cherry Bomb Necklace

A handmade juicy sparkly cherry necklace!

Material: silver colored metal chain.

Size: 40mmX30mm cherry cameo, your choice of a 16.5" or 18" silver colored chain.

name: Black Beauty - Retro Horse Necklace
description:
Black Beauty

Detailed Retro Horse Necklace

'Hot To Trot' features a hand cast resin two-tone horse pendant hung from a stainless steel chain!

Your choice of chain length. 16.5" chain length or 18" chain length.

Material: hand cast resin pendant, stainless steel curb chain

Size: 2"X 1.5" Pendant

name: Praised & Confused - Praying Hands & Roses Necklace
description:
Praised & Confused

Our original creation, the praised & confused necklace, features a hand cast resin sparkly cameo set in a silver plated bezel. There is fine silver glitter embedded in the resin to give it a shimmer effect in sunlight.

Material: Hand cast resin cameo, silver plated setting, silver colored metal (lead free) chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 18" Chain length. 40mm X 30 mm cameo. Approximately 2.75" X 1.75" pendant length (includes cameo and roses).

name: In Flight - Double Swallow Necklace Red OR Black
description:
In Flight 

Swallow Necklace

Double swallow pendants, available in red or black!

Material: Hand cast resin pendant on a silver colored chain.

Size: 16.5" or 18" Chain Length, Each pendant measures 2 7/8" X 1.5".

*Red swallow necklace, photo by Tabatha 'Sugar Day' Acosta for Cherry Blossoms Photography www.cherryblossomsphoto.com. Model is wearing our 18" red swallow necklace.

*Black swallow necklace, modeled by Little Darling @ www.pinupsforpitbulls.com. Model is wearing our 16.5" length black swallow necklace.

name: Dark Knight - Bat Necklace
description:
Dark Knight

Bat Necklace

This creature of the night necklace features a large realistic bat pendant hung from a heavy stainless steel chain.

Material: Hand cast resin bat pendant, stainless steel chain, lobster clasp closure.

Size: Available in 16.5" chain length or or 18". Approximately 3" bat. 

*Modeled image courtesy of Pin Up Girl Clothing. Model is wearing our 16.5" length necklace.

name: Deer Hunter - Deer Plaque & Acorn Necklace
description:
Deer Hunter Necklace

A sweet deer cameo with a two piece acorn embellishment. The deer and plaque are one solid piece, which we designed ourselves and can be found exclusively at Charcoal. Your choice of chain length. 16.5" is a shorter length and 18" is a standard length.

Material: Silver colored metal chain, Resin pendants, Silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: Available in 16.5" chain length or 18", 1.5" X 1.25" deer pendant.

name: Wings Of Love - Swallow Bow Necklace
description:
Wings Of Love-Black On Pink

Swallow Necklace

Wings of love features a hand cast resin swallow set on top of an ornate black bow. The necklace chain is made from hand strung faceted black glass beads.

Material: Handmade resin pendant, glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp.

Size: 18" total chain length, 2.25" X 2" pendant.

name: Love Kills - Derringer Gun Necklace
description:
Love Kills

Love Kills features a hand cast resin derringer pendant, with a hanging two-tone heart & skull charm, hung from a medium weight stainless steel chain.

Material: Handmade resin pendants, stainless steel chain, silver plated lobster clasp.

Size: 16" total chain length, 2.5" X 2" pendant (including the heart).

name: Cut It Out - Resin Scissor Necklace
description:
Cut It Out

Movable Scissor Necklaces

Movable Scissors with ornate detailing on the handles. Made of resin and just the right size! 

The chain is a nicely weighted stainless steel curb chain, with a lobster clasp closure.

Material: 2-piece hand cast resin scissors, stainless steel curb chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 16.5" Chain length, 3" scissor pendant length.

name: Love Is A Battlefield - Gun Shooting Hearts Necklace
description:
Love Is A Battlefield

Heart/Gun Necklace

An original Charcoal Designs creation. "Heartache to heartache we stand, no promises no demands...both of us knowing, love is a battlefield", featuring a hand cast detailed gun pendant with faceted hearts! Available in silver (which is a gray resin with a sparkly silver painted coating) or black!

Material: Handmade resin pendants, stainless steel curb chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 16.5" total necklace length, 3.5" gun/hearts length.

name: FORD - Car Emblem Necklace
description:
FORD

Because I love my '64 Ford Falcon! Show your love for old skool cars with our newest car culture necklace, appropriately named the FORD!

Material: hand cast black resin lettering, stainless steel chain. 

Size: 7" long lettering, approximately 16.5" total length chain.

name: Marie Antoinette - Corset Necklace
description:
Marie Antoinette 

Corset Necklace

A sultry corset silhouette necklace made of hand cast resin, and adorned with vintage black lace and a Swarovski crystal embellishment.

Our images are printed on high quality gloss paper, with archival quality inks (guaranteed to last 75+ years), then topped with a super high gloss coating to protect it from the elements.

Material: hand cast resin corset silhouette, gloss sealed archival quality image, hand cast resin legs with vintage lace and a Swarovski crystal embellishment.

Size: 3.5" long pendants (total length for both), 30" long black epoxy ball chain (can be easily shortened with scissors or snips)

name: Splash - Mermaid Necklace
description:
Splash

Mermaid Necklace

Splash features a hand cast resin pendant, hung from an aluminum black chain with silver edges. Silver plated lobster clasp closure. Available in aquamarine or pink.

Material: Handmade resin pendant, aluminum chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 18" total necklace length, 1 3/4" X 1 3/4" Pendant.

name: Day Of The Dead - Corset Necklace
description:
Day Of The Dead

Corset Necklace

A sultry corset silhouette necklace made of hand cast resin, and adorned with vintage black lace and a Swarovski crystal embellishment.

Our images are printed on high quality gloss paper, with archival quality inks (guaranteed to last 75+ years), then topped with a super high gloss coating to protect it from the elements.

Material: hand cast resin corset silhouette, gloss sealed archival quality image, hand cast resin legs with vintage lace and a Swarovski crystal embellishment.

Size: 3.5" long pendants (total length for both), 30" long black epoxy ball chain (can be easily shortened with scissors or snips)

name: Bubbles - Mermaid Necklace
description:
Bubbles

Beaded mermaid necklace

Bubbles features a sultry sea siren atop a black seashell, hung from a beaded glass pearl chain.

Material: handmade resin mermaid and shell pendant, glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 1 3/4" Pendant, 16.5" Total length necklace chain.

name: Our Lady Of Guadalupe - Cameo Necklace
description:
Our Lady Of Guadalupe

Framed religious cameo necklace

Featuring a hand made resin Our Lady Of Guadalupe (or otherwise known as Virgin De Guadalupe) cameo in passion purple, set in a black ornate resin frame. The chain is hand beaded with black glass faceted beads. Because each resin cameo is hand cast and dyed, the shade of purple may differ slightly than the one shown here, as is the beauty of handmade items. 

Material: resin pendant, glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 2.5 " Pendant (frame included), 16" Total length necklace chain.

name: Jolly Roger - Skull & Bones Cameo Necklace
description:
Jolly Roger

Framed skull & crossbones cameo necklace

Featuring a hand made resin skull and crossbones cameo in hot pink, set in a black ornate resin frame. The chain is hand beaded with black glass faceted beads.

Material: resin pendant, glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 2.5 " Pendant (frame included), 16" Total length necklace chain.

name: Ms. Macabre - Skeleton Cameo Necklace
description:
Ms. Macabre

Framed skeleton woman cameo necklace

Featuring a hand made resin skeleton woman cameo in medium pink, set in a black ornate resin frame. The chain is hand beaded with black glass faceted beads.

Material: resin pendant, glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 2.5 " Pendant (frame included), 16" Total length necklace chain.

name: Death Becomes Her - Skeleton Bow Cameo
description:
Death Becomes Her

Bow frame skeleton woman cameo necklace

Featuring a hand made resin skeleton woman cameo in soft pink, set in a black ornate resin bow frame. Our resin is hand cast so the shade of pink may differ slightly than shown, depending on the batch poured.

Material: resin pendant, aluminum black chain, black aluminum jumprings.

Size: 2 1/4" X 2" pendant, 17.5" Total necklace length.

name: The Aristocrat - Glitter Bow 'Candy' Necklace
description:
The Aristocrat

Like your favorite candy necklaces as a child, now in a grown up glittered out version! The aristocrat features hand poured resin with an inside layer of raspberry or blueberry (your choice) colored glitter!

Material: Hand strung glass beads, silver plated lobster clasp, resin and glitter.

Size: 16" Necklace Length, 2" X 1.75" Bow.

name: Jacques - Seahorse Necklace
description:
Jacques

Seahorse Necklace from our 'Nautical Notions' collection 

Jacques, the seafoam seahorse sits atop a black carved seashell with a pink marbled shell. This unique nautical pendant hangs from a black aluminim chain. Each pendant is hand dyed and poured, colors may vary slightly than the pendant shown.

Material: Handmade resin pendant, aluminum curb chain, silver plated lobster clasp.

Size: 1.75" X 1.75" Pendant, 17" necklace length.

name: I Fought The Law - Handcuff Necklace
description:
I Fought The Law

Handcuff Necklace

Featuring a classic metal handcuff pendant, attached in the center of a stainless steel curb chain.

Material: Metal handcuff pendant, stainless steel chain, silver plated lobster claps.

Size: 1" pendant, approximately 15.5" chain length.

name: Cut Up - Metal Scissors Necklace
description:
Cut Up

Movable Metal Scissor Necklace

Featuring a silver colored movable scissor pendant, hung from a stainless steel curb chain.

Material: Metal scissor pendant, stainless steel curb chain, silver plated lobster clasp.

Size: 1" scissor pendant, 16.75" chain length.

name: Sailor's Grave - Octopus Cameo Necklace
description:
Sailor's Grave-Asst. Colors

Octopus & Anchor Cameo Necklace

Featuring a bad ass octopus cameo with a retro anchor charm. Your choice of cameo color, pink & black, black & red or lime & black, hung from a black aluminum curb chain.

Material: Handmade resin octopus cameo, handmade charm, aluminum chain.

Size: 1.5" wide pendant, 1.75" tall. 16.5" total necklace length.

name: Femme Fatale - Comb & Mirror Skeleton Necklace
description:
Femme Fatale

Skeleton comb and mirror necklace

'Vanity kills'.

Our Femme Fatale necklaces feature an ornate victorian comb and mirror with your choice of a hot pink skull & bones OR skeleton woman cameo.

Material: Hand cast resin pendants, black epoxy metal ball chain.

Size: Approximately 1.5" long pendants, 30" necklace length (can easily be shortened to any length with scissors).

name: 'Custom' Script Necklace - Assorted Colors - SALE
description:
'Custom' Necklace

Available In, 'Hot Pink', OR 'Black'. 

Because custom is always better! Our handmade 'Custom' necklace features a large resin script pendant cast from a vintage car emblem. Amazingly detailed, and definitely unique! 

PLEASE NOTE: THE NECKLACE YOU RECEIVE WILL SAY 'CUSTOM' ON IT, THIS NECKLACE IS NOT CUSTOMIZABLE WITH YOUR OWN WORDING. THIS ITEM IS A REPLICA OF AN OLD CAR EMBLEM, AND WILL COME AS SHOWN. THXS!

Material: Resin script pendant, silver colored chain, silver plated lobster clasp closure.

Size: 3.5" X 1.5" Pendant, It hangs at about a 16.5" length (see modeled photo for reference).

*Was $14.99, Now Only $9.99, For A Limited Time Only!*

name: Demons Are A Ghoul's Best Fiend - Diamond Necklace
description:
Demons Are A Ghouls Best Fiend

Glitter Diamond Necklace

Demons are a ghouls best fiend features hand cast resin demon wings, a green glittered diamond shaped pendant, hung from a black aluminum curb chain. Price is per necklace. Color choices include 'Purple', 'Fink Pink' (Light/Soft Pink) & 'Ghoul Green'. 

Material: High quality crystal clear resin, a sparkly glitter center, black aluminum chain, with a silver plated lobster clasp.

Size: 17" Total Necklace Length (not including clasp), 5" Pendant Length (includes diamond & wing span).

*Fink Pink Is Temporarily Sold Out.

name: Salty Seas-Anchor & Ship Necklace (Red OR Blue)
description:
Salty Seas

Ship & Anchor Cameo Necklace

A dash of nautical flare. Salty seas features a retro ship pendant with a delicate anchor charm, hung from a long 30" stainless steel ball chain. Available in Sea Blue or Stars & Stripes Red.

Hint: The chain can easily be cut with scissors if you prefer a shorter length.

Material: Handmade ship cameo pendant (the ship and cameo are one piece, the ship is not glued onto the cameo, i.e. it's super sturdy), silver colored metal anchor charm, 30" stainless steel ball chain.

Size: 30" chain length, 1 7/8" X 1.5" pendant.

name: The Villain-Mustache Necklace
description:
The Villain

Old Timey Mustache Necklace

The villain features an old timey handlebar mustache pendant, hung from a long black ball chain, attached with a thick black jumpring for a seamless look.

The opening for the mustache is big enough to fit most nostrils, making this a functional pendant, and a great conversation piece!

Material: Resin, Metal Ball Chain

Size: 30" Chain Length (very easy to trim and resize with a pair of scissors), The mustache pendant measures approximately 2 6/8" X .75"

name: Braaains!!-Zombie Brains Necklace
description:
Braaains!!

Bloodied Zombie Brains Necklace

Braaains features a hand cast resin brain pendant, with strategically placed red resin 'blood'. So lifelike you'd think it was a fresh kill!

Each pendant is handmade and unique, the blood splatters will differ from pendant to pendant but each is a guaranteed scream!

Wear one to your next Walking Dead screening, Zombie Crawl or simply freak out your parents!

Material: Resin, Metal Ball Chain

Size: 30" Chain Length (very easy to trim and resize with a pair of scissors), The brain pendant measures approximately 1.5" X 1 7/16" X .5".

name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang-Gag Gun Necklace
description:
Kiss kiss bang bang, features a hand cast resin pendant, and a glossy coated 'bang' sign, in homage to the old skool gag guns!

Material: Hand cast resin pendants, gloss coating, stainless steel curb chain.

Size: 3.5" X 1.25" Pendant (includes gun and sign), 16.5" Total Necklace Length.
